text: Va ononro, ki az Parvardigorason tarsidand va amal ʙa toati U kardand, guruh-guruh ʙa ʙihist meʙarand. Cun ʙa ʙihist ʙirasand, darhojas kusoda savad. Va az saʙaʙi pok ʙudani asari gunohonason darʙonhoi ʙihist ʙo muƶdaho va hursandiho ʙarojason gujand: «Salom ʙar sumo, pokiza ʙudaed xus ʙosed, pas covidona ʙa on ʙihist daroed
